summary: SummaryA toner that refreshes and comforts skin, leaving it cleansed, optimally toned and prepared for the next steps of your ritual.
details: DetailsKey Ingredients2 marine ingredients cleanse skin and help preserve its essential functions.Blue micro-algae helps protect the complexion from pollution, and marine salicornia extract moisturizes and fortifies.Item 2531905How To UseApply with a cotton pad to awaken the complexion in the morning and to remove traces of makeup and pollutants in the evening.IngredientsAqua (Water), PEG-32, Peg/Ppg/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, PEG-11 Methyl Ether Dimethicone, Methyl Gluceth-20, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Algae Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Sodium Citrate, Sodium PCA, PPG-13-Decyltetradeceth-24, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance), Maris Aqua (Sea Water), Sodium Hyaluronate, Phytic Acid, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium, Benzoate, Tocopherol, IL56B.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply with a cotton pad to awaken the complexion in the morning and to remove traces of makeup and pollutants in the evening.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Pricey and broke me out. You would think for the price it wouldn't break out skin.

reviews.headline: My favorite toner!!
reviews.comments: This toner feels soothing but doesn't leave my skin feeling sticky at all. The scent is amazing and very light, but of course like all chanel products, if you are very sensitive to fragrance I would recommend a sample before buying. Alcohol free so its great for my dry leaning skin, still an excellent makeup remover. Preps my skin nicely for the rest of my routine. This is a staple for me!!

reviews.headline: My fav. daytime toner
reviews.comments: It is very gentle and refreshing. I love it.

reviews.headline: Expensive but Totally Worth It!
reviews.comments: I have used plenty of toners in the past but this product is by far the best. The gal at the Chanel counter recommended it and she was so right! Any leftover grime or makeup on my face is gently removed when I use this toner with a white cotton pad. Others leave behind grime but this one captures at all!

reviews.headline: Favorite toner!
reviews.comments: This product is so gentle and effective!
